title: MistSwap Proposal List
description: Schema for list of proposals compatible with the MistSwap voting system

Version.description: The version of the list, used in change detection

major.description: The major version of the list. Must be incremented when tokens are removed from the list or token addresses are changed.

minor.description: The minor version of the list. Must be incremented when tokens are added to the list.

patch.description: The patch version of the list. Must be incremented for any changes to the list.

title.description: The a succinct title as displayed in the list
examples: Should MistSwap change its color scheme to green?

content.description: Markdown content of the proposal shown when fully expanded
examples: This is longer form content which fully describes what is being proposed.

strategy.description: What type of strategy for voting should this proposal do?

options.description: An array of options available for this proposal

snapshotBlock.description: The block where this snapshot was taken

endBlock.description: The block where this proposals vote is finished

timestamp.description: The timestamp of this list version; i.e. when this immutable version of the list was created
